name: Danganronpa: Lapse
description:
The killing game between hope and despair continues...
Danganronpa: Lapse is a non-profit fan game based on the series Danganronpa, by Kazutaka Kodaka, and bears no affiliation with Spike Chunsoft.
10 students are trapped in a mansion, with only one requirement for escape, to kill each other.
≡≡≡
This is a prologue prototype. The full prologue has not been finalized, but will be updated as the story progresses.Currently features all student introductions.≡≡≡This first half of the prologue has been finalized but I couldn't contain how excited I was that all the stuff works...! So here's this thing!!!
